name: Advanced Voice and Movement
description: Voice and Movement is a skill-developing companion to the DRM400 training for performers. It exposes students to a wide range of voice and movement techniques and explores a heightened use of physicality, voice and speech.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Minimum 70% in required courses: DRM220Y1/ DRM230Y1; DRM300Y1; acceptance into DRM403Y1 or permission of the Centre
